#summary menuitem widget reference

= menuitem widget =
A [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkMenuItem.html GtkMenuItem], [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkCheckMenuItem.html GtkCheckMenuItem], [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkRadioMenuItem.html GtkRadioMenuItem] or [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkImageMenuItem.html GtkImageMenuItem]
----

== Definition ==
{{{
<menuitem tag_attr="value"...>
	<variable>varname</variable>
	<height>value</height>
	<width>value</width>
	<input>command</input>
	<input file>filename</input>
	<visible>state</visible>
	<action>activity</action>...
	<action signal="type">activity</action>...
	<action type="function">parameter</action>...
	<output file>filename</output>
</menuitem>
}}}
"..." denotes acceptance of multiples of the same thing.

== Tag Attributes ==
See the [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkMenuItem.html#GtkMenuItem.object-hierarchy GtkMenuItem], [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkCheckMenuItem.html#GtkCheckMenuItem.object-hierarchy GtkCheckMenuItem], [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkRadioMenuItem.html#GtkRadioMenuItem.object-hierarchy GtkRadioMenuItem] or [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkImageMenuItem.html#GtkImageMenuItem.object-hierarchy GtkImageMenuItem] widget and ancestor class properties.

The following custom tag attributes are available:
|| *Name* || *Description* || *Value* || *Since* ||
|| block-function-signals || Block signal emissions from functions || {{{true}}} or {{{false}}} || 0.7.21 ||
|| accel-key || Accelerator key || A decimal or hexadecimal value [http://git.gnome.org/browse/gtk+/plain/gdk/gdkkeysyms.h (full list)] || 0.7.21 ||
|| accel-mods^[1]^ || Accelerator modifiers || A decimal or hexadecimal value [http://git.gnome.org/browse/gtk+/plain/gdk/gdktypes.h (full list)] || 0.7.21 ||
|| image-icon^[2]^ || GTK theme image name ||  || 0.7.21 ||
|| image-stock || Stock GTK image name || {{{gtk-about}}}, {{{gtk-add}}}, ... [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/gtk-Stock-Items.html#GTK-STOCK-ABOUT:CAPS (full list)] || 0.7.21 ||
|| image-file || Image filename ||  || 0.7.21 ||
|| checkbox || Active state || {{{true}}} or {{{false}}} || 0.7.21 ||
|| radiobutton || Active state || {{{true}}} or {{{false}}} || 0.7.21 ||

== Signals ==
The default signal for the GtkMenuItem and GtkImageMenuItem widgets is "[http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkMenuItem.html#GtkMenuItem-activate activate]", emitted when the item is activated.

The default signal for the GtkCheckMenuItem and GtkRadioMenuItem widgets is "[http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/gtk-gtkcheckmenuitem.html#GtkCheckMenuItem-toggled toggled]", emitted when the state is changed.

All widgets emit the "activate" signal.

See also the [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkMenuItem.html#GtkMenuItem.signals GtkMenuItem], [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/gtk-gtkcheckmenuitem.html#gtk-gtkcheckmenuitem.signals GtkCheckMenuItem] or [http://developer.gnome.org/gtk/2.24/GtkRadioMenuItem.html#GtkRadioMenuItem.signals GtkRadioMenuItem] widget and ancestor class signals.

== Functions ==
The following functions can be performed upon this widget by any widget capable of emitting signals:
|| *Type* || *Description* || *Parameter* || *Since* ||
|| enable || Sensitise widget || Shell variable name || ||
|| disable || Desensitise widget || Shell variable name || ||
|| refresh || Reload input data || Shell variable name || 0.7.21 ||
|| save || Save widget data || Shell variable name || 0.7.21 ||

The following general functions can be performed by any widget capable of emitting signals:
|| *Type* || *Description* || *Parameter* || *Since* ||
|| command || Execute command || Shell command || ||
|| exit || Exit dialog || A value for the {{{EXIT}}} shell variable || ||
|| closewindow || Close launched dialog || Launched dialog's shell variable name || ||
|| launch || Launch new dialog || New dialog's shell variable name || ||

== Notes ==
1. SHIFT is 1, CTRL is 4 and ALT is 8 and you can OR them together.

2. Theme images are hardcoded to 16x16 and do not scale.
